articles.author: Katherine Donlevy
articles.title: CDC to send personnel to fight rare, deadly Marburg virus in Africa - New York Post
articles.description: The Marburg virus has killed 12 people in Guinea and Tanzania since February.
articles.content:
The US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is sending personnel to Africa to help quell a rare, deadly viral outbreak that has killed 12 people since February.
